LONGITUDE.description: Longitude of the point being looked at

LATITUDE.description: Latitude of the point being looked at

ALTITUDE.description: Altitude of the point being looked at

TILT.description: Tilt in degrees from vertical (0=straight down)

RANGE.description: Range in meters from the point

COLOR.description: KML color in aabbggrr hex format
KML color in aabbggrr hex format
KML color in aabbggrr hex format
KML color in aabbggrr hex format

BG_COLOR.description: Background color in aabbggrr hex format

TEXT_COLOR.description: Text color in aabbggrr hex format

STYLE_URL.description: Style URL or inline style ID

COORDINATES.description: Coordinates (first = last to close the ring)

KMLLatLonQuad.description: LatLonQuad — four corner coordinates for ground overlay

KMLRegion.description: Region — Level of Detail bounding region

REFRESH_VISIBILITY.description: Whether to refresh on visibility change

FLY_TO_VIEW.description: Whether to fly to view on refresh

OPEN.description: Whether folder is open in tree view
Whether document is open in tree view
